definition[0]: to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding
example[0]: I asked her if she was ready to go, and she nodded.
definition[1]: to move your head down and up again once in order to greet someone or give someone a sign to do something
example[3]: The judge nodded at the foreman to proceed.
example[4]: She nodded to us as she walked by.
example[5]: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
example[6]: I showed the doorman my card and he gave a friendly nod.
